She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, cooking oil and other personal care products.

Jonalyn has borrowed and repaid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from buying and selling personal care products. Jonalyn aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, cooking oil and other personal care products.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is 41 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Zenaida has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending. Zenaida aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr: Awa qui se trouve debout à l’extrême droite de la photo, est membre d’un groupe de 10 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Samale au sud-ouest de Bamako au Mali. Awa, âgée de 34 ans, est la mère de 6 enfants âgés de 3 à 13 ans, dont 3 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés.  L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer a incité Awa à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 17 ans. Awa cultive l'arachide, le gombo sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles et d'engrais de qualité. Awa entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro et de l'image positive de myAgro dans les villages avoisinants. Cette année Awa effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.125 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 10 ans que Awa cultive l'arachide pour sa valeur vivrière, expliquant que l’arachide est directement consommable par la famille et est utilisée comme sauce de base dans l’alimentation et aussi pour sa valeur commerciale, car l’arachide est un aliment qu’elle vend sur le marché. Awa planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de pouvoir faire du commerce et d'acheter du matériel agricole. Elle a mentionné que, "je veux construire un grand magasin pour le commerce." Enfin Awa espère aussi pouvoir couvrir les frais scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
Awa, who is standing second from the right in the photo, is a member of a group of 10 farmers who have joined myAgro. They live and work in the village of Samale, south-west of Bamako, in Mali. Awa is 34 years old and a mother of six children, aged from three to 13 years old. Three of the children are in school.

Awa has worked in farming now for 17 years, because it has been a family tradition, and it is a principle source of income and a food supply for her family. Awa grows groundnuts and okra on her piece of land, but must face many difficulties, especially the lack of farming materials and quality fertilizer. 

Awa has started her first year with myAgro and joined because of the possibility of increasing her yields from myAgo services and the positive reputation myAgro has in the neighboring villages. This year Awa will make payments to buy myAgro OPV seeds and fertilizer to grow groundnuts and increase her yields on her 0.125 hectare of land.

It has now been 10 years since Awa has been growing groundnuts for their nutritional value--they can be directly consumed by the family and used as a sauce base.  They also have a commercial value, because they can be sold at the market.

With an increase in yields and earnings, Awa plans to buy agricultural materials and work in commerce. 

Awa mentioned that, "I want to build a big shop to conduct commerce in." Finally, she hopes to also be able to cover her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy OPV (openly pollinated variety) seeds and fertilizer to grow groundnuts

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 44 years old and married with four children. With two children still in school, Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, cooking oil and personal care products.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Josephine has been in this business for 19 years.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, cooking oil and personal care products

loans.name: Korotim's Group

texts.fr: Korotim qui se trouve sur la photo portant un foulard orange et tenant deux pochettes en main, est membre d’un groupe de 10 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Faraba (OUE) au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Korotim, âgée de 67 ans, est la mère de 12 enfants dont 3 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés.  L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer, mais aussi son mariage avec un agriculteur, ont incité Korotim à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 10 ans. Korotim cultive le mais, le mil sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles et d'engrais de qualité. Korotim entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison du système de paiement et de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro. Cette année Korotim effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.125 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 10 ans que Korotim cultive le maïs pour sa rentabilité productive et marchande. Korotim planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de pouvoir faire du commerce. Enfin Korotim espère aussi pouvoir couvrir les frais scolaires des enfants ainsi qu'assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
Korotim, who is found wearing an orange scarf and holding two badges in her hand, is a member of a group of 10 farmers who have joined myAgro. They live and work in the village of Faraba (OUE), south-east of Bamako, in Mali. Korotim is 67 years old and is the mother of 12 children. Three of the children are in school.

Korotim has worked in farming for 10 years now, because it is a family tradition, it provides a principal source of revenue, it provides food for the household, and also because she is married to another farmer. Korotim grows corn and millet on her piece of land, but she faces difficulties, especially a lack of farming materials and quality fertilizer.

Korotim has started her first year with myAgro and joined because of the payment system they have and the possibility of increasing her yields from the myAgro searches. This year, she will make payments to buy myAgro fertilizer to grow groundnuts and increase her yield on her 0.125 hectare of land.

It has been 10 years since Korotim started growing corn for its profitability. With an increase in yields and earnings, Korotim plans to work in commerce. Finally she hopes to be able to cover her children's school fees and ensure her family's food independence.

loans.use: to acquire fertilizer to grow groundnuts

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela is 59 years old and is a single woman. She works very hard to provide for her needs.

Adela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, home care products, personal care products, and other groceries.

Adela has been in this business for 10 years. 

In the future, Adela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, home care products, personal care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 50 years old and has two children. Rosemarie is married and has one child who is still in school.

Rosemarie is in the agricultural business, doing pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosemarie has been in pig fattening for 13 years now, and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Rosemarie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Eduarda, ella pertenece al banco “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
 La socia continua  dedicándose a la venta de comida de forma ambulatoria, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua elaborando diferentes tipos de platos para sus  clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de menestras, aceite entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Eduarda is a member of  the  “Señor de los Temblores II” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru. She is still selling food as a street vendor. She is a responsible and hard-working person. She continues to produce different types of dishes for her customers who ask for them and this is how she brings her family up.

Eduarda is asking for the loan to buy dried vegetables, oil and other supplies. She is grateful for the loan provided and promises to meet her repayment instalments.

loans.use: to buy dried vegetables, oil and other supplies.

loans.name: Evelyn Vanessa

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vista Al Mar se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año, por su gastronomía muy variada y muchos atractivos turísticos que atraen al turista nacional o extranjero.
En este lugar vive la señora Evelyn, tiene 30 años de edad está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 13, 12 y 5 años que estudian dos en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es capitán de un barco de pesca.
Doña Evelyn con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos se dedica a la venta de bisuterías de todo tipo, ella tiene un pequeño local arrendado en el centro comercial de la ciudad, muchas las personas que asisten a este lugar todos los días ya que es un centro de compras y diversión muy concurrido, allí trabaja con la ayuda de dos chicas a quienes les paga un sueldo mensual por su trabajo, lleva 2 años con este negocio el cual les permite ganar lo propio y ser fuente de ingresos para las personas que trabajan con ella. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar collares, aretes y todo tipo de bisuterías que ella vende en su local. Lleva 3 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y el grupo es agradable. Sus sueños es tener su propio local.
texts.en:
The Vista Al Mar loan group meets every 15 days in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches that are visited often throughout the year, for its very varied gastronomy and for many tourist attractions for Ecuadorians or foreigners. Evelyn lives here; she is 30 years old, is married, and has three children from this relationship, ages 13, 12 and 5. Two are studying in high school and the youngest is in elementary school. Her husband is the captain of a fishing boat.

In order to earn her own money, Evelyn works selling all kinds of jewelry. She has a small stall that she leases in the commercial center of the city. A lot of people go there every day since it's a very busy shopping and entertainment center. She works there with the help of two girls who she pays a monthly salary for their work. She has had this business for two years and it has allowed her to earn her own money and to be a source of income for the people who work with her. She is going to use this loan to buy necklaces, earrings and all kinds of jewelry that she sells in her stall. 

She has been in the loan group for three cycles and she likes it because the loans are fast and the group is pleasant. Her dream is to have her own store.

loans.use: to buy necklaces, earrings and all kinds of jewelry

loans.name: Jaime Aparicio

texts.es:
El socio Jaime, él pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. 
El socio Jaime continua ejerciendo  su carrera de diseñador grafico, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio continua elaborando diferentes tipos de diseños para sus  clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de una laptop.
El socio agradece a  KIVA por otorgarle el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This borrower is Jaime, who belongs to the communal bank “Señor de los Temblores II” ["Lord of the Earthquakes II"] of the city of Cusco, Peru.
 
Jaime continues to work in his profession as a graphic designer. He is a responsible and hard-working person. He continues to prepare various types of designs for his clients who request them. In this way, he is helping his family get ahead. 

He is requesting the loan in order to carry out maintenance on a laptop. He is grateful to Kiva for providing him with the loan, and he is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on a laptop.

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr: Awa qui se trouve sur la photo au premier rang, 2 ème position et portant un foulard rouge et wax vert, est membre d’un groupe de 8 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Faraba (OUE) au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Awa, âgée de 75 ans, est la mère de 8 enfants dont l'1 d’entre eux est actuellement scolarisé.  L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer, mais aussi l'agriculture lui permet d'assurer l'autosuffisance pour sa famille, ont incité Awa à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 50 ans. Awa cultive l'arachide, le mil sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles et d'engrais de qualité. Awa entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison de l'avis favorable de son entourage sur l'impact positif de myAgro et de l'image positive de myAgro dans les villages avoisinants. Cette année Awa effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.125 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 50 ans que Awa cultive l'arachide pour sa valeur vivrière, expliquant que l’arachide est directement consommable par la famille et est utilisée comme sauce de base dans l’alimentation. Awa planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de pouvoir faire du commerce. Enfin Awa espère aussi pouvoir assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
Awa, who is in the first row of the photo, wearing a red  and green wax-cloth head scarf,  is a member of a group of eight farmers registered with myAgro, living and working in the village of Faraba (OUE) in the southeast of Bamako, Mali. Awa, aged 75, is the mother of eight children of whom one is presently in school. 

The anchor of the family is in agriculture, the principal source of income and of food self-sufficiency for the household, but it is also agriculture that permits Awa to ensure self-sufficiency for her family, and that moved her to engage in this activity for 50 years now. Awa grows peanuts and millet on her plot of land but as a farmer, she has to face difficulties such as lack of agricultural supplies and high quality fertilizer. 

Awa is beginning her first year with myAgro and she registered because of the favorable opinions of those around her on the positive impact of myAgro and the positive image of myAgro in neighboring villages. This year Awa is making payments to buy a myAgro package of fertilizer for growing peanuts so as to expand the yield on her plot of  0.125 hectare. Awa has been growing peanuts for 50 years now because of their value as a foodstuff, explaining that peanuts are directly edible by the family and are used as a base for sauces in cooking. With the increase in her yield and her income, Awa plans to do small-scale commerce. Finally, she hopes to be able to ensure food self-sufficiency for her family.

loans.use: to acquire a package of fertilizer for growing peanuts in order to increase the agricultural productivity of her plot of land

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal KANCHARISUN, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Maria Jesús continua con el negocio de venta de artículos de regalos y la socia a la vez la socia continua trabajando en una empresa privada, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de  esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de peluches.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Kancharisun" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, within the Department of Cusco.

The borrower, Maria Jesús, is continuing with her business selling gift items. At the same time, she is also still working for a private business. She would like to keep working in order to continue supporting her family. 

She is grateful for the loan provided to her, and she is committed to making her payments on schedule. 

She is requesting the loan to buy stuffed animals.

loans.use: to buy stuffed animals to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to continue her studies of Food Processing and be able to create her own business.

loans.name: Aurora Narcisa De Jesús

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Bahía De Caraquez, conocida por sus hermosas playas, por su rica y variada gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo  De Crédito Solidario.
En este lugar vive señora Aurora, tiene 58 años y mantiene una relación de unión libre y fruto de aquella relación tienen cinco hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo comerciante.
Doña Aurora se dedica junto a su marido a la venta de billetes de lotería, su esposo y ella recorren la ciudad ofreciendo sus boletos pero cada uno por una ruta diferente, lo hacen así para poder copar mas territorio y vender más boletos, ellos salen todos los días y son más de 35 años dedicados a sus ventas, así siempre se han ganado  la vida de una manera honrada.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar billetes de lotería para la venta de ella y su  esposo. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo  De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y gozando de buena salud.
texts.en:
In the city of Bahía De Caraquez, known for its beautiful beaches, its delicious and varied cuisine, and the warmth of its people, the members of the Solidarity Credit Group meet every two weeks. 

In this place lives Aurora, who is 58 years old. She has a common-law husband, and from this relationship she has five adult children. Three of them still live in her home. Her husband is a merchant. 

Aurora works together with her husband selling lottery tickets. She and her husband go around the city to offer their tickets, with each one taking a different route. They do it this way in order to cover more territory and sell more tickets. They go out every day, and they have dedicated themselves to these sales for more than 35 years. In this way, they have always earned a living in an honorable manner. 

They will use this loan to buy lottery tickets for her and her husband to sell. She has been in the Credit Group since the beginning, and she likes it because thanks to the loans she is able to finance her business. Her dream is to keep going in the future while enjoying good health.

loans.use: to buy lottery tickets to sell.

loans.name: Mónica Alexandra

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vista Al Mar se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año, por su gastronomía muy variada y muchos atractivos turísticos que atraen al turista nacional o extranjero.
En este lugar vive la señora Monica, tiene 38 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tiene un  hijo de 12 años el mismo que estudia en colegio y el cual es su compañía. Ella hace tiempo atrás aprendió belleza en un centro artesanal de la ciudad.
Doña Mónica es una mujer muy trabajadora que realiza cualquier actividad para sacar adelante sola a su hijo, ella realiza diversidad de trabajos de belleza como cortes de cabellos, tinturados, pintado de uñas, entre otros, realiza sus trabajos en su casa y a domicilio, ella también vende ropa de todo tipo puerta a puerta y aprovecha cuando realiza sus trabajos para vender sus prendas las mismas que deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 o 15 días. Lleva más de 15 años con este negocio el cual le permite ganarse sus propios recursos.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, esmaltes y otros materiales de belleza. Esta desde el inicio en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella saca adelante su negocio. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
Grupo De Crédito Vista Al Mar [Seaview Credit Group] meets every 15 days in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches that are well-frequented in every season, for its very varied cuisine, and many tourist attractions that appeal to national and foreign tourists.

In this place lives Monica. She is 38 years old, is separated, and has a 12-year-old son from this relationship who is studying at school and keeps her company. Long ago, she learned about beauty in a craft center of the city.

Mónica is a very hardworking woman that carries out any occupation to bring up her son by herself. She performs a diversity of beauty works like haircuts, hair dyeing, nail painting, among others. She does her work at home and on house calls. She also sells all types of clothes door to door and when performing her work, takes the opportunity to sell her jewelry which she gives on credit and collects every 8 or 15 days. She's been with this business for over 15 years which allows her to earn her own resources.

This loan is to buy clothes, nail polish, and other beauty supplies. She has been in Grupo De Crédito from the start and likes it because thanks to the loans, she moves her business forward. Her dream is to give the best to her child.

loans.use: to buy clothes, nail polish, and other beauty supplies.

loans.name: Franklin Javier

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Bahía De Caraquez, conocida por sus hermosas playas, por su rica y variada gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo  De Crédito Solidario.
En este lugar vive don Franklin, tiene 38 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tienen 3  hijos de 18, 15  y 13 años que  estudian en colegio. Su esposa es comerciante.
El señor Franklin es un hombre muy trabajador que hace lo posible para que a su familia no les falte lo necesario para vivir, el se dedica a la distribución y venta de billetes de lotería,  tiene un local en el cual les entrega a 8 personas que trabajan para él para que ellos salgan a recorrer la ciudad y ciudades cercanas vendiendo, su esposa también le ayuda con las ventas, el hace 4 años  empezó vendiendo solo y después fue invirtiendo más y ahora con la ayuda de los créditos ha podido aumentar su negocio y contratar personas para que trabajen para él con lo cual le mejoran sus ingresos y sale adelante.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar billetes de lotería. Lleva 2 ciclos  en el Grupo  De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando cada vez más.
texts.en:
In the city of Bahía De Caraquez, known for its beautiful beaches, its delicious and varied cuisine, and the warmth of its people, the members of the Solidarity Credit Group meet every two weeks.

In this place lives Franklin, who is 38 years old. He is married, and from this relationship he has three children, aged 18, 15  and 13, who are in school. His wife is a merchant.

Franklin is a very hard-working person who does everything he can to ensure that his family doesn't lack for anything they need to live. He works distributing and selling lottery tickets. He has a shop where he provides tickets to eight people who work for him, so that they can go out into the city and nearby towns to sell them. His wife also helps him with the sales. He started four years ago by selling alone, and later he continued to invest more. Now, with the help of the loans, he has been able to expand his business and hire people to work with him. This has improved his income and helped him get ahead. 

He will use this loan to buy lottery tickets. He has been in the Credit Group for two loan cycles, and he likes it because the loans are provided quickly. His dream is to continue improving more and more.

loans.use: to buy lottery tickets to sell.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Joan works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Joan is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF in order to buy new tools, equipment and ingredients for her bakery business.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new tools, equipment and ingredients for her bakery.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en:
Claudine is 34 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, Claudine works very hard to provide for them.

Claudine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, condiments, junk foods, personal product care and other groceries.

Claudine has been in this business for 3 years now. 

In the future, Claudine would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, condiments, junk foods, personal product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a single woman with fourteen children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Juliet is 46 years old and has five children who are presently in school.

Juliet has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines. Juliet requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables like cabbage, potato, garlic, squash and etc to sell on her food stall.

Juliet has been in this business for 26 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables like cabbage, potato, garlic, squash to sell on her food stall.

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is 44 years old and has four children. Jovita is married, and two of her children are still in school.

Jovita is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Jovita requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jovita has been in this business for 15 years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
As a parent of three children, Annabelle works hard to support her family.

She has a processed food (peanut butter) business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Annabelle is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her processed food (peanut butter) business.

Annabelle has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Ее зовут Нигина. Она живет на районе Брхтар. Ей 33 лет. Нигина ответственная, гостеприимная и приятная в общение женщина. Она проживает вместе с мужем и двумя детьми. Детям 7 и 4 года. Муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, чтобы зарабатывать и прокормить семью. Нигина занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. Она продвигает эту деятельностью более 4 года. Нигина обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет закончить ремонт. Она сумела отремонтировать всего одну комнату. Остальные комнаты дома остаются без ремонта, и Нигина хочется получить кредит и за счет кредита отремонтировать остальные комнаты. На счет заемных средств Чамила намерена приобрести строй материалы. И на оставшуюся часть денег она планирует купить новую швейную машинку, потому что ее нынешняя швейная машинка устарела. Нигина много лет жила в старом доме и несколько лет копила деньги на ремонт. Она была очень расстроена признав, что ее денег не хватит для завершения ремонта и для нее единственный выход получения кредита.
texts.en:
This is Nigina. She is 33 and lives in the Bohtar region. She is a responsible and hospitable woman who is pleasant to talk to. She lives with her husband and two children aged seven and four. Her husband is currently working in Russia so he can earn money to feed his family. Nigina works sewing women's clothing to order, a business she has had for more than four years. 

Nigina is looking for a loan because she wants to finish home renovations. She has been able to renovate only one room. The remaining rooms in her home remain unrenovated and Nigina wants to take out a loan so she can finish them. She intends to use the loan amount to purchase building materials, as well as to buy a new sewing machine, because her current one has gotten old. 

Nigina has lived in an old house for many years and saved money for years to pay for renovations. She was very upset to learn that she didn't have enough to cover the costs of the renovations and her only option is to take out a loan.

loans.use: to buy building materials and a sewing machine

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina works hard to support her family. Felomina is widowed and has a buying and selling of religious articles business in the Philippines.

Felomina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more religious items to sell to her customers.

Felomina has been in this business for 17 years now.

In the future, Felomina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more religious items to sell to her customers

loans.name: Carine

texts.en:
Carine is 42 years old and married with three children. With one child in school, Carine works very hard to provide for the family.

Carine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, snack foods, personal care products and other groceries.

Carine has been in this business for three years now. 

In the future, Carine would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, snack foods, personal care products and other groceries

loans.name: Lyell

texts.en:
Lyell is 43 years old and has five children. Lyell is married and has five children who are in school.

Lyell is in the agricultural business of farming mangoes in the Philippines. Lyell requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lyell has been farming mangoes for three years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Lyell would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie works hard to support her family. Julie is married and has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

Julie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

Julie has been in this business for 10 years now.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Julie Ann

texts.en:
Julie Ann is 34 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by having a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. Julie Ann is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Julie Ann has been in pig fattening for two years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Sadbarg

texts.ru: Это женщина Садбарг. Ей 49 лет. Она мать двоих детей. Детям 25 и 23 лет.Дети уже взрослые и самостоятельно зарабатывает на жизнь.  Садбарг со своей семьей проживает на районе Бохтар. Садбарг старается зарабатывать на жизнь. Она занимается поваром на столовой автозаправочном заправке «Oil». Сабдарг вкусно готовить. Ей клиентам нравится ее блюдо. Она сейчас собирается отремонтировать дом. Садбарг обращается за кредитом, и за счет кредита хочет отремонтировать свой дом и улучшить жилищные условия. За счет кредита она купить стройматериалы. Ее надежды и мечты на будущее, жить в хороших условиях и обеспечить новые экономические возможности для своей семьи.
texts.en:
This woman is Sadbarg. She is 49 and the mother of two children aged 25 and 23, both of whom are now independent adults who earn a living on their own. She and her family live in the Bohtar region. She tries to earn a living working as a cook in the cafeteria of a filling station called Oil. She is a good cook and her customers like what she makes. 

Sadbarg is currently preparing to renovate her house. She is looking for a loan so she can renovate her house and improving her living conditions. She will use the loan amount to purchase building materials. Her hopes and dreams for the future include living in good conditions and creating new economic possibilities for her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials and renovate her house

loans.name: Yohana Paola

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Bahía De Caraquez, conocida por sus hermosas playas, por su rica y variada gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo  De Crédito Solidario.
En este lugar vive la señora Yohanna, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 3 hijos de 10, 4 y 3 años,  el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Yohana es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y contribuir con los gastos que genera su hogar y la crianza de sus hijos, ella es repostera y prepara deliciosos postres y bocadillos, tiene unas mesas en las cuales vende al publico sus bocadillos los mismos que acompaña con jugos o gaseosas si así sus clientes lo desean, ella desde que recibe los créditos ha ido mejorando su negocio el mismo que ya tiene por más de 3 años y  le deja lo necesario para sacar adelante a su familia.
Ella espera utilizar este crédito para comprar una vitrina que le permita exhibir sus bocadillos y mejorar la presencia de su negocio. Lleva 3 ciclos en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella mejora su negocio. Sus sueños son tener un gran local.
texts.en:
In the city of Bahía de Caraquez, known for its beautiful beaches, rich and diverse gastronomy, and the warmth of its people, the members of the Grupo De Crédito Solidario meet every 15 days.

Yohana lives in this place. She is 32 years old, married, and from this relationship has 3 children of 10, 4, and 3 years of age, and the eldest child is in school. Her husband is a driver. Yohana is a woman who likes to be self-sufficient and contribute to the expenses of her household and the raising of her children. 

She is a pastry chef and makes delicious desserts and sandwiches. She has some tables where she sells her sandwiches to the public, along with juices and sodas if her customers want them. Since she has been receiving loans, she has been improving her business, which she has had for 3 years and which provides her with enough to get her family ahead.

She hopes to use this loan to buy a display cabinet that would allow her to display her sandwiches and improve her business presence. She has completed 3 cycles in the credit group and she likes it because she can improve her business with the loans. Her dream is to have a great shop.

loans.use: to buy a display cabinet.

loans.name: Krystel Ann

texts.en:
Krystel Ann is 25 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, Krystel Ann works very hard to provide for the family.

Krystel Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, cooking oil and other personal care products.

Krystel Ann has been in this business for six years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, cooking oil and other personal care products

loans.name: Diane Marie

texts.en:
Diane Marie is 22 years old and married with one child. Diane Marie works very hard to provide for the family.

Diane Marie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, condiments, snack foods, home care products and other groceries.

Diane Marie has been in this business for two years now. 

In the future, Diane Marie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, condiments, snack foods, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is 58 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, Tita works very hard to provide for the family.

Tita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Tita has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, shampoo, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Tita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Genelyn

texts.en:
Genelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a dry goods business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of dry goods like slippers, blouses, sandals, shorts, etc., to sell for her dry goods business.

Genelyn has been in this business for four years. Genelyn earns more income from food vending.

Genelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dry goods like slippers, blouses, sandals, shorts, etc., to sell

loans.name: Rajabgul

texts.ru: 57 летная женщина Рачабгул. Рачабгул  семенная женщина. У нее трое детей. Двое сыновей и одна дочка. Сыновьям 30 и 27 лет. Дочке 24 лет. Мужу 59 года. Ее дети умные и активные. У Рачабгул высшая образования. Она 12 лет занимается врачом в больнице. В этой работе ей нравится ухаживать о пациентом и лечить людей. На районе все знают Рачабгул, потому что она хороший и опытный врач.  Рачабгул долго лет жила в старом доме. И сейчас начала разрушить старый дом и на месте старого построит новый дом. К сожалению, у нее не хватает денежных средств для покупки стройматериалы. Рачабгул большими надеждами обратилась к Вам за кредитом.  Поддержите ее! Она будет осень рада на Вашу помощь.
texts.en: Rajabgul is a 57-year-old family woman. She has three children: two sons and one daughter. Her sons are 30 and 27, and her daughter is 24. Her husband is 59 years old. Her children are clever and active. Rajabgul has a higher education. For 12 years, she has worked as a doctor in a hospital. In this job, she likes to take care of patients and to treat people. In the region, everyone knows Rajabgul, because she is a good and experienced doctor.  Rajabgul has for many years lived in an old home. And now she has begun to break down the old house and in its place to build a new one. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to purchase construction materials. With high hopes, Rajabgul applied for a loan and will be very glad for the help.

loans.use: to purchase building materials to build a new home.

loans.name: Antonia Del Socorro

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Bahía De Caraquez, conocida por sus hermosas playas, por su rica y variada gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo  De Crédito Solidario.
En este lugar vive la señora Antonia, tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene seis hijos mayores de edad e independientes.
Doña Antonia es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y salir adelante sola sin depender de sus hijos ni de nadie, ella hace tres años atrás y con la ayuda de los créditos surtió una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, frutas y legumbres, carnes, pescado entre otras cosas, en su tienda sus clientes consiguen de todo y es por eso que su clientela aumenta cada día más,  trabaja todos los días desde las 06h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde. Ella así se entretiene y se gana la vida.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, entre otros productos. Esta desde el inicio en el  Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
In the city of Bahía de Caraquez, known for its beautiful beaches, rich and diverse gastronomy, and the warmth of its people, the members of the Grupo De Crédito Solidario meet every 15 days.

Antonia lives in this place. She is 53 years old, a single mother, and has six grown and independent children. Antonia is a woman who likes to be self-sufficient and get ahead on her own, without depending on her children or anyone else.

Three years ago, with the help of the loans, she stocked a small store of provisions in her home. There she sells products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, fruits and legumes, meats, and fish, among other things. Her customers find everything in her store, and that is why her clientele expands more each day. She works everyday from 6:00am to 8:00pm, and sometimes later. This is how she keeps herself entertained and earns a living.

She will use this loan to further supply her store. She will buy rice, sugar, oil, and detergent, among other things. She has been in the credit group since the beginning and she likes it because of the help the loans provide. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Ercidio

texts.pt:
O senhor Ercidio de 34 anos de idade, casado, trabalhador vive na casa cedida pelo seu tio.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, varroes, cimento, material de coferragem, blocos, chapas de zinco, portas de madeira para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir e ampliar a sua obra para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família, ter uma unidade de produção de culturas próprias e futuramente comprar uma viatura para lhe ajudar no seu dia-a-dia.
Os principais desafios são financeiros tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Ercidio is 34 years old and married. He's in the workforce and lives in a house that was provided to him by his uncle.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase rods, cement, formwork supplies, bricks, zinc plates, and wooden doors so he can continue his construction work.
Ercidio's dream is to finish and enlarge his house so that he can provide a better home for his family. He also dreams of having his own farm and later on buying a vehicle to help him in his daily endeavors.
His main challenges are financial. He has been working hard and he intends to get other loans in order to overcome difficulties and accomplish his goals.

loans.use: to purchase rods, cement, formwork supplies, bricks, zinc plates, and wooden doors so he can continue his construction work.

loans.name: Charito

texts.en:
Charito is 51 years old and married with eight children. With five children in school, Charito works very hard to provide for them.

Charito runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, eggs, cigarettes, home product care and other groceries.

Charito has been in this business for 3 years. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Charito would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, eggs, cigarettes, home product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 58 years old with two children. With one child in school, Editha works very hard to provide for them.

Editha runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like eggs, condiments, home product care and other groceries.

Editha has been in this business for 5 years now. 

In the future, Editha would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like eggs, condiments, home product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Larida

texts.en:
Larida works hard to support her family. Larida is widowed and has a business making nipa roofing in the Philippines.

Larida requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy raw materials like nipa leaves, bamboo sticks, string and other materials.

Larida has been in this business for 3 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like nipa leaves, bamboo sticks, string and other materials.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 44 years old, married and has four children. One of her children is in school.

Patricia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Patricia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds, medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Patricia has been raising pigs for four years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Patricia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a very hardworking entrepreneur from Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is 42 years old and has four children of which one is in College and one in High School and the rest are not of school age yet. She is married to Segio, a security guard. The couple work hard to provide for the needs of their family.

Maricel has been selling fruits and vegetables for six years already. She buys her veggies and fruits from a wholesaler on a farm and sells them by the kilo. She already has regular customers in the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 800 in sales every day. 

Maricel is requesting a PHP 20,000 loan to purchase more quantities of vegetables and fruits to sell. She will use the loan to pay for veggies such as cabbage, string beans, eggplant, squash, potatoes, carrots and fruits like bananas and pineapples.  Veggies and fruits are already a staple in Filipino households to make more nutritious and delicious dishes. She is thanking God and you in advance for the good return on her investment and the financial help that will be extended to her for it will surely help cover their daily sustenance and pay for her children's schooling.

Maricel hopes to sustain and grow her business. She prays for God to allow her family to prosper and have a happy and quiet life. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is comprised of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for various kinds of fruits and veggies to sell.

loans.name: Estevao

texts.pt:
O senhor Estevão de 41 anos de idade, casado,pai de 5 filhos dos quais 3 já são maiores independentes 1 frequenta o ensino primário e o outro sem idade escolar, comerciante vende blocos pedra, vive na casa da mãe.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento para fabricar blocos para o seu estaleiro
O cliente tem como sonho,ampliar o seu negocio e responder as necessidades dos seus clientes, e comprar uma camioneta para facilitar a entrega de mercadoria.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, é a falta de uma camioneta para fazer melhor as entregas das encomendas, pretende fechar rápido o credito par tomar outro para suprir as suas dificuldades e alcançar os objetivos.
texts.en:
Estevão is 41 years old and married. He has five children, three of whom are independent, one is in primary school and another one is below schol age. He's a trader who sells bricks. He lives with his mother.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase cement to make bricks for his construction supply yard.
Estevão's dream is to expand his business and meet his customers' needs. He also dreams of buying a pickup truck to make it easier for him to deliver the merchandise.
His main challenges are financial, due to the lack of a pickup truck to better deliver the orders. He intends to repay the loan quickly so that he can get another one in order to overcome his struggles and achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase cement to make bricks for his construction supply yard.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 54 years old and married with one child. Editha works very hard to provide for them.

Editha runs a general store  in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home product care and other groceries.

Editha has been in this business for 11 years. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

In the future, Editha would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Lily is 58 years old, married and has six children.

Lily is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Lily requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lily has been in this business for 25 years now, she also earns additional income from raising pig and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Llaquel Araselis

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Bahía De Caraquez, conocida por sus hermosas playas, por su rica y variada gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo  De Crédito Solidario.
En este lugar vive la señora Llaquel, tiene 48 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos mayores de edad e independientes, con ella viven dos nietos de 9 y 6 años de edad que son como hijos suyos y estudian en escuela.
Doña Llaquel es una mujer muy luchadora que siempre le ha tocado trabajar duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos y actualmente a sus nietos, ella tiene una tercena en su casa, allí ella  vende carne de chancho y de pollo, ella recibe en su local  los chanchos por piezas y los pollos enteros que los pela y luego vende por libras, ya son más de 12 años que lleva realizando esta actividad la cual le deja lo necesario para salir adelante ella sola sin depender de nadie.
Este crédito es para comprar carne de chancho y de pollo para la venta diaria. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta ya que con los créditos ella puede salir adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus nietos.
texts.en:
In the city of Bahia De Caraquez, known for its beautiful beaches, its rich and varied cuisine and the warmth of its people, the Grupo de Credito Solidario meets every two weeks.

This is the place where Llaquel lives.  She is 48 years old, is separated and from this relationship she has two adult, independent children.  Two of her grandchildren live with her, aged 9 and 6 years of age who are like her children and are studying in school . 

Llaquel is a very feisty woman who has always had to work hard to raise her children and currently her grandchildren.  She has a meat shop in her home, where she sells pork and chicken meat at retail.  There, she receives pork in pieces and whole chickens that she prepares and sells by the pound.  She has been doing this activity for more than 12 years, which gives her what is needed to get by on her own without relying on anyone.

This loan is to purchase pork and chicken meat for sale daily. She has been a member of Grupo de Credito from the start and likes it, because with the  loans she can get ahead.  

Her dreams are to give the best to her grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase pork and chicken meat.

loans.name: Justino

texts.pt:
O senhor Justino anos é solteiro, comerciante ,  pai de 2 filhos estes sem idade escolar , vive na casa da mãe.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, bolachas, cigarros, fósforos, doces, velas, jigas , pipocas,  para reforçar o seu negocio.
O cliente tem como sonho, estudar formar se em engenharia electrónica, direito e construir uma casa para a sua familia.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, pretende fechar rápido o credito par tomar outro para suprir as suas dificuldades e alcançar os objetivos.
texts.en:
Justino is single. He's a vendor and has two children who are below school age. He lives with his mother.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase crackers, cigarettes, matches, sweets, candles, popcorn and other items to stock his business.
His dream is to study, get a degree in electronic engineering and law, and build a house for his family.
His main challenges are financial. He intends to repay the loan quickly so he can get another one in order to ovecome his struggles and achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase crackers, cigarettes, matches, sweets, candles, popcorn and other items to stock his business.

loans.name: Margaida

texts.pt:
A senhora Margarida de 40 anos de idade, casada, comerciante vende produtos de primeira necessidade, mãe de 3 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam o ensino secundário, 1 o ensino primário e vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do credito pretende comprar, feijão, amendoim, batata, cebola, óleo, caldo, para ampliar o seu negocio.
A cliente tem como sonho, ampliar o seu negocio para responder as necessidades dos seus clientes, e futuramente comprar uma viatura para facilitar as compras do seu negocio.
Tem como principais desafios financeiros e a concorrência no mercado mas tem estado a  melhorar os seus serviços , esta a fazer xitiques e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus sonhos
texts.en:
Margarida is 40 years old and married. She's a vendor who sells products that are household staples. She has three children, two of whom are in secondary school and one is in primary school. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she intends to purchase beans, peanuts, potatoes, onion and broths in order to expand her business.
Margarida's dream is to expand her business so she can meet her customers' needs. In the future she hopes to buy a vehicle to facilitate buying supplies for her business.
Her main challenges are her finances and competition in the market, but she has been improving her services. She uses rotating credit and intends to get other loans so that she can overcome her struggles and achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to purchase beans, peanuts, potatoes, onion and broths in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
O senhor Joaquim de 36 anos de idade é casado, comerciante pai de 1 filho este que frequenta o ensino primário, tem também 2 sobrinhos na sua responsabilidade vive na casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, berbequim e linchadeira para lhe ajudar na sua carpintaria.
O cliente tem como sonho, construir uma casa melhor para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família, e construir um a carpintaria maior para ampliar o seu negocio e responder as necessidades dos seus clientes.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, a falta de maquinaria apropriada leva a lentidão do trabalho mas tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mas vezes o credito para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Joaquim is 36 years old and married. He's a trader and the father of a son who's in primary school. He also has two nephews under his responsibility. He lives in a house that he owns.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase a power drill and a sander to help him in his woodwork.
Joaquim's dream is to build a better house so he can provide a better home for his family. He also dreams of building a larger carpenter's shop in order to expand his business and meet his customers' needs.
His main challenges are financial, and the lack of appropriate equipment slows down his work. However, he's been working hard and he intends to get other loans so he can overcome his struggles and achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase a power drill and a sander to help him in his woodwork.

loans.name: Tania Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA.
La socia continua  dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua criando pollos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollos entre otros.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Valle Sagrado de Calca [Sacred Valley of Calca]. She continues making a living by her business of raising animals, and is a responsable and earnest person. She continues raising chickens to then sell them to her customers who request them and hopes to be able to continue working in this way to continue supporting her family. 

The partner is requesting a loan to buy chickens and other items. She is happy for the loan and promises to meet her quota payments.

loans.use: to buy chickens and other items.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
Valentina es una mujer multifacética que sabe adaptarse a las necesidades de su ambiente, para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos. Nunca ha tenido miedo a emprender pues desde joven inició con un estudio fotográfico porque era lo que más se demandaba en el país, luego abrió una peluquería hasta que en la actualidad, apostó por las tecnologías al abrir un cyber café en su casa.  

Por ello, solicita un préstamo para la compra de más computadoras y para mejorar su local. Esto le será de mucha ayuda porque ampliaría el sistema de cómputo de su negocio y atraerá más clientes, en consiguiente sus ingresos también incrementaran.  Valentina confía que con estas mejorar se convertirá en el cyber café más acondicionado de su zona.
texts.en:
Valentina is a woman of many talents who knows how to adapt to the needs of her environment to get her three children ahead. She has never been afraid to get started, and when she was young she started a photography studio because it was in the highest demand in her country. Later she opened a hair salon, until currently when she bet on technology to open a cyber café in her home.

For this, she requests a loan to buy more computers and to improve her shop. This will help her a lot because she will expand the computer system of her business and attract more customers, and as a result her income will also increase. Valentina trusts that with these improvements it will become the cyber café with the best setup in her zone.

loans.use: to buy computers and remodel her shop.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA.
La socia Andrea alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar entre otros.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This partner is a member of the communal bank Valle Sagrado de Calca [Sacred Valley of Calca]. Andrea alternates her daily activities, making a living with her grocery story business. She is a responsible and persistent person, and hopes to continue working in this way to continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar and other items. She is happy for the loan and promises to complete all of the payments for her quota.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
O cliente casado maritalmente, pai de um filho de 3 filhos dos quais 2 são do sexo masculino e uma menina com idades compreendidas entre os 4 e 9 anos. É cliente na instituição pela primeira vez  e espera que seja o inicio duma grande relação para a materialização dos seus projectos. Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar uma caixa de velocidade pra montar numa viatura de marca Mazda e com a mesma pretende fazer trabalhos de transporte de material de construção local. 
Do momento seu maior desafio é montar a caixa de velocidade na viatura. A nível pessoal o cliente sonha em fazer um acampamento num terreno de 200m² com vista pra o mar. A nível profissional não se sente realizado e logo que o carro estar operacional ira abrir um estaleiro, fazer transporte de carga
texts.en:
Antonio is married and has three children, two of whom are boys and one is a girl. His children range in age from 4 to 9 years old. He's a first-time client of the institution and he hopes that this is the beginning of a great relationship that leads to the accomplishment of his projects. With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase a gearbox which he will install in a Mazda vehicle. He intends to use that vehicle to provide services transporting construction supplies locally.
His biggest challenge at the moment is installing the gearbox in the vehicle. On a personal level, Antonio dreams of going camping on a 200-square-meter area with a view of the ocean. On a professional level, he isn't fulfilled. As soon as the car is ready he will open a construction supply yard and provide cargo transportation services.

loans.use: to purchase a gearbox to install in a vehicle.

loans.name: Arminda

texts.es:
La Sra. Arminda es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que esta esforzándose para poder salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida, esta trabajando en su despensa todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder comprar insumos para su despensa.
Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar bebidas, panificados, lácteos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe nuevamente de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Arminda is a very hardworking and determined person who is making an effort to get ahead and be someone in life. She is working in her grocery store everyday from very early hours in the morning. She states that she used her previous loan to buy supplies for her store.

Today she requests a new loan to be able to buy drinks, baked goods, dairy products, and other things, so that she will be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity she is again receiving to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy drinks, baked goods, dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
A Sra. Fátima, casada maritalmente, mãe de 4 filhos com idades compreendidas entre 09 a 19 anos de idade com a estudar ainda, na sua responsabilidade tem um sobrinho vivendo com ela. Cliente da Hluvuku-Adsema pela quinta vez, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar 14 chapas de zinco, 18 sacos de cimento, 15 ferros 8, 10 carinhas de pedra e pagar o mestre.
A nível profissional ela sente se satisfeita no emprego que tem e sonha abrir uma barraca para venda de alimentos, e o seu principal desafio é concluir sua casa
texts.en:
Fátima is married and has four children whose ages range between 9 and 19. Her children are still in school. She has a nephew who's under her responsibility and lives with her. She's a fifth-time client of Hluvuku-Adsema. With the current loan she intends to purchase 14 zinc plates, 18 sacks of cement, 15 pieces of iron and 10 cartloads of rocks, and to pay the mason.
On a professional level she's happy at her current job and she dreams of setting up a stall for selling foodstuffs. Her main challenge is to finish her house.

loans.use: to purchase 14 zinc plates, 18 sacks of cement, 15 pieces of iron and 10 cartloads of rocks, and to pay the mason.

loans.name: Ana Sofia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA.
La socia Ana Sofia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al cultivo de hortalizas como zanahorias, tomates entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio del cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar abono y semillas.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This partner belongs to the communal bank Valle Sagrado de Calca [Sacred Valley of Calca]. Ana Sofia alternates her daily activities, making a living by growing vegetables such as carrots and tomatoes, among others. She takes good time with her business, which is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds. She is happy for the loan and promises to make her quota payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines.

Marietta requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Marietta has been in this business for 37 years now, and also earns additional income from food vending and buying and selling fuel firewood.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Denny Enriqueta

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Bahía De Caraquez, conocida por sus hermosas playas, por su rica y variada gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente, cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo  De Crédito Solidario.
En este lugar vive la señora Denny, tiene 46 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tiene cinco hijos mayores de edad, el menor de ellos estudia en colegio y es quien vive con ella.
Doña Denny es una mujer que le siempre le ha gustado trabajar en lo que ella le encanta que es la cocina, ella  tiene un restaurante donde prepara desayunos, almuerzos y platos a la carta, sus clientes siempre prefieren la variedad de mariscos que ella ofrece y  su especialidad que es el pescado  apanado con ensalada y patacones. Lleva más de  10 años en su negocio el cual le da para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Con ella trabaja una persona a quien le paga por su trabajo.
Este crédito es para comprar mariscos y víveres para preparar los alimentos. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los crédito siempre le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son tener buena salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
In the city of Bahía De Caraquez, known for its beautiful beaches, for its delicious and varied cuisine, and for the quality of its people, every fifteen days the members of the Grupo De Crédito Solidario [Solidarity Credit Group] meet. In this place lives Denny, who is 46 years old, is separated and from that relationship has five older children and a younger child who studies in school and lives with her.

Doña Denny is a woman who has always liked to work, and loves to cook. She has a restaurant where she prepares breakfast, lunch and dishes from the menu. Her customers always prefer the variety of seafood that she offers and her specialty, which is breaded fish with salad and plantains. She has had her business for more than 10 years which covers her household expenses. She works with one other person who she employs in her business. 

This loan is to buy seafood and supplies to prepare the food. She has been in the Credit Group since the beginning and likes it because the loans always help a lot. Her dreams are to have good health in order to carry on.

loans.use: to buy seafood and supplies.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en: Felicitas has a wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities from growing, caring for and harvesting and earning income as well. Felicitas has supported her husband doing this type of work. Like a farmer, Felicitas has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knew she can always turn to the PMPC for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds that should result in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.  Someday, Felicitas hopes to purchase more rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that should result in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Anelia

texts.en: Anelia is 51 years old and is married. The family lives in Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is earning a profit through her "tuba" (coconut wine) vending and she is also working in swine production to generate additional income. This is how she helps support her husband in sustaining their day-to- day survival. Anelia joined PMPC to learn about insurance and financial assistance. Recently, she borrowed an amount to purchase bags of gestating feeds for the swine and pay for more containers of "tuba" for sale. She is a hardworking mother who has a strong determination to pursue her goals. Someday, she hopes to arrange a decent house and have a stable financial status for her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of gestating feeds for the swine and pay for more containers of "tuba" for sale.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
In January of 2011, Eva applied for membership in PMPC and had her first loan. She is from Unidos, Plaridel. Eva came up with the idea of starting a business. She joined PMPC after hearing that she could request financial assistance. Eva applied for a loan to start her "suman"-making business and it has been doing well for years now. 

Recently, she requested a loan to purchase additional cooking equipment like a steamer and other raw ingredients like glutinous rice to increase her production, to provide for more customers and to be able to display her suman in shops and cafes on consignment. She also plans to use her additional revenue for her increasing orders. Eva is thankful for the financing she gets for her capital needs.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking equipment like a steamer and other raw ingredients like glutinous rice to increase her production

loans.name: Rosalinie

texts.en:
Rosalinie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a raising pigs business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Rosalinie has been in this business for 4 years. Rosalinie earns additional income from food vending.

Rosalinie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Ednalyn

texts.en:
As a married parent, Ednalyn works hard to support her family.

She has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from fish vending. Ednalyn is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy spare parts and pay for maintenance for her bicycle transport business.

Ednalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and pay for maintenance for her business.

loans.name: Ma. Concepcion

texts.en:
Ma. Concepcion is 33 years old and married with four children. With two children in school, Ma. Concepcion works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Concepcion runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Ma. Concepcion has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft-drinks and personal care products. 

In the future, Ma. Concepcion would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lizel

texts.en:
Lizel works hard to support her family. Lizel is single with one child and has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines.

Lizel requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell in the market.

Lizel has been in this business for 2 years now and also earns additional income from a buy and sell spices business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell in the market.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 42 years old with four children. With two children in school, Evangeline works very hard to provide for them.

Evangeline runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 3,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like condiments, junk foods, cigarettes, personal care products and other groceries.

Evangeline has been in this business for 2 years now. 

In the future, Evangeline would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like condiments, junk foods, cigarettes, personal care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 29 years old and married with two children. With one child still in school, Lorna works very hard to provide for them.

Lorna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, bread, drinks, etc.

Lorna has been in this business for 4 years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, bread, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 48 years old and married with six children. Four of her children are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Melanie is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Melanie has been raising pigs for three years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ma. Valeria

texts.en:
Ma. Valeria is 38 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Ma. Valeria is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her business.

Ma. Valeria has been raising pigs for 2 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her business.

loans.name: Maria Gina

texts.en:
Maria Gina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 44 years old and has three children who are in school.

Maria Gina has a mat weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed for her business.

Maria Gina has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her business

loans.name: Marife

texts.en:
Marife works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell personal collection business in the Philippines.

Marife requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items of personal care products to sell to her customers.

Marife has been in this business for 15 years now, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items of personal care products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 48 years old and married with five children.
